== Main Inclusion Report for axis ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/a/axis available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** build dependency of libmx4j-java
 0. ''Security:''
** <nowiki>[[http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvekey.cgi?keyword=axis|CVE]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://secunia.com/search/?search=axis|Secunia]]</nowiki>: Irrelevant entries only.  ''An independent search reveals what is probably only one problem, in 2002, reported on <nowiki>[[http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/6398/info|BugTraq]]</nowiki> and forwarded to the <nowiki>[[http://xmlfr.org/cache/0014.html|Apache security]]</nowiki> list.  Context and followups elsewhere suggest that this problem was fixed at the time. -iwj''
** Java library package, no binary
** Quick and shallow source code review performed.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Library package works out of the box, no debconf questions
** Package not in Debian
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki> compliant

 0. ''Dependencies:''
